content:
# The attempt to craft Iron Gear Wheels has failed again due to the same issue: the need for a specific crafting machine, which I currently do not possess.
# 
# To move forward, I need to prioritize crafting an Assembling Machine, as it will enable me to produce the necessary items like Iron Gear Wheels and other components.
# 
# The Assembling Machine requires:
# - 3 Iron Plates
# - 5 Iron Gear Wheels (which I cannot craft yet without an Assembling Machine)
# 
# Since I cannot craft the Assembling Machine directly, I will need to focus on crafting a few more items that can be built using the stone furnace. 
# 
# I can craft a Burner Mining Drill, which requires:
# - 1 Iron Gear Wheel
# - 2 Iron Plates
# 
# I will craft 1 Burner Mining Drill first, which will help me gather more resources.

craft_item(Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill, quantity=1)  # Crafting 1 Burner Mining Drill.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Checking updated inventory after crafting.
